targets.rawSql: SELECT date_trunc('minute', ts) AS time, count(*) AS value FROM events WHERE $__timeFilter(ts) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1
SELECT date_trunc('minute', ts) AS time, count(*) AS value FROM events WHERE threat_score >= 60 AND $__timeFilter(ts) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1
SELECT process_name AS app, count(*) AS connections, count(DISTINCT remote_ip) AS unique_ips FROM events WHERE is_public = 1 AND $__timeFilter(ts) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT remote_country AS country, count(*) AS connections FROM events WHERE remote_country <> '' AND $__timeFilter(ts) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT ts, process_name, remote_ip, remote_country, threat_sources, threat_score FROM events WHERE threat_score >= 60 AND $__timeFilter(ts) ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 50
